column1: 37613663$Millennium Ankh$$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Normal$$$Show 5 "Forbidden One" Monster Cards from your hand
column4: then Special Summon 1 "The Unstoppable Exodia Incarnate" from your Extra Deck
column5: then shuffle the face-up Monster Cards you control into the Deck
column6: except "Exodia" Monster Cards whose original Levels are 10 or higher
column8: also you cannot Summon for the rest of this turn. After activation
column9: shuffle this card into the Deck instead of sending it to the GY.$$$$$
